title: Supply-Chain for Agriculture
description: The local trade is almost driven by a series of middlemen resulting in price inflation in agriculture products. Traceability issues.
solution: A B2B supply-chain on  Cardano blockchain-based web application and telegram bot.
experience: A Full-Stack & Mobile App Eng, tested Plutus playground, B.SC in Computer Science, 4.5 years, key connections. Solidity smart-contracts.
